function.name: replacenode
function.description: Replace the provided HTML/XML node node with the new node replacement. replacement must be a string containing valid xml.

example.description: Given an XML-file note.xml, which contains:

examples.example: <note id="1"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment> <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>

example.description: then after executing the following code:

examples.example: <note id="1"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Invitation</heading> <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment> <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>
